Uses of Class
imagingbook.common.mser.components.PixelMap.Pixel

  • Packages that use PixelMap.Pixel 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.common.mser.components  

    • Uses of PixelMap.Pixel in imagingbook.common.mser.components

      Methods in imagingbook.common.mser.components that return PixelMap.Pixel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      PixelMap.Pixel PixelMap.Pixel.getNextNeighbor()
      Gets the next neighbor of this pixel that is inside the containing image.
      PixelMap.Pixel PixelMap.getPixel​(int u, int v)
      Returns the PixelMap.Pixel instance at the specified position.
      PixelMap.Pixel[] PixelMap.getPixelVector()
      Returns a new 1D array (i.e., a "flattened" vector in row-first order) of PixelMap.Pixel elements, e.g., for sorting pixels by value.
      Methods in imagingbook.common.mser.components that return types with arguments of type PixelMap.Pixel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Collection<PixelMap.Pixel> Component.getAllPixels()
      Returns a collection of all pixels of this component, including the component's local pixels and the pixels of all child components.
      Collection<PixelMap.Pixel> Component.getChildPixels()
      Returns a collection of all pixels contained in the children of this component.
      Collection<PixelMap.Pixel> Component.getLocalPixels()
      Returns a list of "local" pixels that directly belong to this component All these pixels have the same 'level' as the component itself.
      Methods in imagingbook.common.mser.components with parameters of type PixelMap.Pixel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int PixelMap.Pixel.compareTo​(PixelMap.Pixel other)
